name: date-preview
description: Preview date time as your desired.

date-preview.detect.ISO-8601String.markdownDescription: Whether to detect [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format date string.

date-preview.detect.unixTime.description: Whether to detect Unix time. Currently supports 10/13 digits.

date-preview.primaryPreview.name.markdownDescription: Show as the name of primary preview section.

date-preview.primaryPreview.format.markdownDescription: Primary date preview format, described in [day.js format documentation](https://day.js.org/docs/en/display/format). Leave empty to use ISO-8601 format.

date-preview.primaryPreview.utcOffset.description: UTC offset of primary preview timezone. If the input is between -16 and -16, it will be interpreted as hours, otherwise, minutes instead. Leave empty to use local timezone.

name.description: Show as the name of alternative preview section.

format.description: Used to format preivew display. Leave empty to use ISO-8601 format.

utcOffset.description: UTC offset of custom preview timezone. If the input is between -16 and -16, it will be interpreted as hours, otherwise, minutes instead. Leave empty to use local timezone.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
